paper_abstract: Trusted computing is a novel technology of information system security. It has become a new tide in worldwide information security area and achieved inspiring accomplishment. In China, the initiative research of trusted computing is not late, and the achievements are plentiful and substantial. Our country is in the front rank of the world in trusted computing. This paper comprehensively illustrates the recent development in theory and technology of trusted computing, introduces some improvements in trusted computing in our country, and proposes our opinions and viewpoints towards the existing problems in trusted computing and its future development.
paper_title: Research on trusted computing and its development
